data.name: Deliverance
data.detailed_description: Deliverance is my tribute game to the West! A survive PVP game set in the wild west. The Main Objective? Stay Alive!! Craft bullets and bombs, buy weapons and supplies. Find a house and set the lock to make it yours. An early access game that I would love your input.
data.about_the_game: Deliverance is my tribute game to the West! A survive PVP game set in the wild west. The Main Objective? Stay Alive!! Craft bullets and bombs, buy weapons and supplies. Find a house and set the lock to make it yours. An early access game that I would love your input.
data.short_description: Hunt...Craft,,, and survive the wild west. A survival PVP extravaganza! Hunt Others, Craft your own custom bullets and bombs, Search for bosses and level up your outfit to survive the Wild west in this unique western survival game!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS 10
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

data.legal_notice: No fish were killed in the making of this game.

content_descriptors.notes: shooting. killing. large spiders. illegal drug reference. partial nudity
